effect.diamond_pearl: Boosts the power of the target’s moves by 50% until the end of this turn. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.platinum: Boosts the power of the target’s moves by 50% until the end of this turn. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Boosts the power of the target’s moves by 50% until the end of this turn. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Ally’s next move inflicts half more damage.
short_effect.platinum: Ally’s next move inflicts half more damage.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Ally’s next move inflicts half more damage.

flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A move that boosts the power of the ally’s attack in a Double Battle.
